# SnapVault Client Galleries

> The secure, high-speed portal for uploading and viewing guest wedding and event media. No app download required.

SnapVault Client Galleries is a web application built and hosted by Weddings By Mark (https://weddingsbymark.uk). It allows event guests to upload photos, videos and audio messages directly to a private gallery using a simple QR code scan — no app install needed.

## What It Does

- Guests scan a printed QR code at the event venue
- They upload photos, videos and audio messages from any device
- The event organiser gets a private gallery with all guest media
- Supports weddings, birthdays and corporate events
- Files up to 200MB with automatic video compression
- Printable QR cards in multiple premium designs and sizes

## Who It's For

- Wedding couples wanting guest photos in one place
- Birthday party hosts collecting memories
- Corporate event organisers gathering attendee media
- Wedding planners and event coordinators

## Key Features

- Private guest upload via QR code (no login required for guests)
- Organiser dashboard to manage events and view galleries
- Admin panel for platform management
- Customisable QR card templates (Wedding, Birthday, Corporate)
- Bulk media download as ZIP
- Secure payment flow with admin approval
- Automated email delivery of personalised QR cards
- Self-hosted and fully private — your data stays on your server

## Built By

**Weddings By Mark**
Website: https://weddingsbymark.uk
SnapVault: https://snapvault.uk
Client Galleries: https://galleries.snapvault.uk
